image_resize_height.description: Target height to resize the input image before block analysis. Width is scaled proportionally.

number_block_horizontal.description: Number of horizontal blocks to divide the image into for diagnostics.

number_block_vertical.description: Number of vertical blocks to divide the image into for diagnostics.

dark_regions_num_warn_thresh.description: Warning threshold for number of dark image blocks.

blockage_region_num_warn_thresh.description: Warning threshold for number of blocked image blocks.

lowVis_region_num_warn_thresh.description: Warning threshold for number of low visibility image blocks.

backlight_region_num_warn_thresh.description: Warning threshold for number of backlight image blocks.

dark_regions_num_error_thresh.description: Error threshold for number of dark image blocks.

blockage_region_num_error_thresh.description: Error threshold for number of blocked image blocks.

lowVis_region_num_error_thresh.description: Error threshold for number of low visibility image blocks.

backlight_region_num_error_thresh.description: Error threshold for number of backlight image blocks.

blockage_ratio_thresh.description: Threshold for the ratio of non-black pixels in a block to be considered blocked.

blockage_intensity_thresh.description: Pixel intensity threshold used to binarize grayscale image for blockage detection.

blockage_freq_ratio_thresh.description: Threshold for average frequency magnitude below which a block is considered blocked.

dark_intensity_thresh.description: Grayscale intensity threshold under which a block is considered dark.

low_visibility_freq_thresh.description: Threshold for average frequency magnitude below which a block is considered low visibility (e.g., blurry or foggy).

backlight_intensity_thresh.description: Grayscale intensity threshold above which a block is considered overexposed (backlight).
